content: Well this is what it has come down to... Speaker Patooie has made the statement when asked about her accusations.. "I have nothing else to say about the matter, I stand on my previous comments". So that's it huh? A done deal? If this were a republican there'd be OUTRAGE from the democratic side of the fence, looking for blood. Personally I believe the Speaker should not be given a pass by her own party, or anywhere for that matter, without coming forward with "something" to substaniate her claims, pro or con........ but the dems are trying to bury this and we see the hole already dug by her statement this morning. One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE

content: The CIA lied. They provided false intelligence to the publc all throughout the Bush Administration. Remember the iron clad intelligence about Iraq Atomic Weapons they provided to then Sec of State Powell that he gave testimony about in front of the UN? The CIA became a political arm of the Bush Administration that routinely "cooked" old useless intelligence in order to justify us going to war in Iraq. Why should the Bush era CIA or the Office of the VP with their outing for political gain of active covert CIA agents ever be believed? So guess what, Ms. Pelosi is still House Speaker, 3rd in line for the Presidency. Keep up the excellent work Madame Speaker. "I believe that banking institutions are more dangerous to our liberties than standing armies." - T. Jefferson

content: The CIA lied. They provided false intelligence to the publc all throughout the Bush Administration. Remember the iron clad intelligence about Iraq Atomic Weapons they provided to then Sec of State Powell that he gave testimony about in front of the UN? The CIA became a political arm of the Bush Administration that routinely "cooked" old useless intelligence in order to justify us going to war in Iraq. Why should the Bush era CIA or the Office of the VP with their outing for political gain of active covert CIA agents ever be believed? So guess what, Ms. Pelosi is still House Speaker, 3rd in line for the Presidency. Keep up the excellent work Madame Speaker. "I believe that banking institutions are more dangerous to our liberties than standing armies." - T. Jefferson
